text: pus dunyawi zindagi ki halath tuh aisi hai jaise hum ne aasman se pani barsaya,phir us se zamin ki nabataath jin ko admi aur chau paaye khate hai qoob gunjaan2 ho kar nikli,yaha tak ke jab wo zamin apni raunakh ka pora hissa le chuki aur us ki qoob zebayesh3 ho gai aur us ke maliko ne samajh liya ke,ab hum is par bilkul qaabiz ho chuke,tuh din mein ya rath mein us par hamari taraf se koi hukm (azaab)aa pada,so hum ne us ko aisa saaf kar diya ke goya kal wo maujodh hee na thi,hum isi tarah ayaath ko saaf saaf bayan karte hai,aise logo ke liye jo sonchte hai
